name: generate_project_zip
description: Generate a new project from a cookiecutter template using ZIP download (bypasses git)

templateName.description: Name of the template to use

outputDir.description: Output directory for the generated project (optional, defaults to current directory)

name: test_template_access
description: Test if a template URL is accessible without generating a project

templateName.description: Name of the template to test

tools.name: list_templates
tools.description: List all available cookiecutter templates with their descriptions

tools.name: get_template_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific cookiecutter template

templateName.description: Name of the template to get info for

tools.name: generate_project
tools.description: Generate a new project from a cookiecutter template

templateName.description: Name of the template to use

outputDir.description: Output directory for the generated project (optional, defaults to current directory)

templateValues.description: Key-value pairs for template variables (optional, uses defaults if not provided)
